title: Unique item ideas
body:
First is an AP item for jungle to replace magus
Imagine a tiny kennen ult that procs every 5 seconds doing x damage to minions and monsters for x amount of damage, and procs on champions if you attack them.
Increases bonus mana by 25% cause cinderhulk for mages .

Next is what I will call mage's fortitude 

Builds from {{item:3191}} and my 3rd suggestion

+35 armor
+70 Ap
+200-400hp

Passive: if champion falls below 20% hp, a shield is activated blocking 400 damage. This shield is not effective against AP based damage.

Item 3 ethereal guard

Builds from blasting wand and ruby crystal

+40 ap
+250 hp

See shield from above but a lower value.



Would these items be even remotely cool/useful?
